contentModules.copy: I am comfortable using a variety of different web technologies, from front end languages like Javascript, to back end languages like PHP.

imagetextCopy.copy: I‚Äôve been a full stack developer for 5 years now. My primary focus is WordPress, I specialize in building custom themes and plugins from scratch, often paired with an e-commerce platform like WooCommerce. Recently, I‚Äôve been exploring JavaScript libraries, particularly React. This portfolio website combines those two technologies using the WordPressCMS as my backend to store all the data, using the WordPress REST API to access that data. On the front-end, I‚Äôm using React to parse and present the data.
